body:
### Describe the bug

did `pip install cython` and trying to follow the bottom snippet here: https://docs.cython.org/en/latest/src/userguide/parallelism.html
getting errors like above.
Also had to `import cython.parallel` because 
`from cython.parallel import parallel`
Cannot find reference 'parallel' in 'parallel.py | CythonDotParallel' 


### Code to reproduce the behaviour:

from bottom of that paged linked to
```
from cython.parallel import parallel
from cython.cimports.openmp import omp_set_dynamic, omp_get_num_threads

num_threads = cython.declare(cython.int)

omp_set_dynamic(1)
with cython.nogil, parallel():
    num_threads = omp_get_num_threads()
    # ...
```
do `pip install cython` in a conda environment, not mini-conda.


### Expected behaviour

Imports should work and I should be able to run the example.  


### Environment

OS: Ubuntu 22.04
Python version Python 3.7.11
Cython version Cython version 0.29.32



### Additional context


comment_data.body: The cimports syntax is a new feature in Cython 3 alpha, so you need to make sure you install that version.

How do I do that?

Nobutaka Kim
Gatech ID: 903459082
Ph: 604-356-5560
Alternate: ***@***.***

________________________________
From: da-woods ***@***.***>
Sent: Saturday, November 5, 2022 10:23 AM
To: cython/cython ***@***.***>
Cc: Kim, Nobutaka ***@***.***>; Author ***@***.***>
Subject: Re: [cython/cython] [BUG] Cannot find reference 'cimports' in 'cython.py | __init__.py | __init__.py' (Issue #5116)


The cimports syntax is a new feature in Cython 3 alpha, so you need to make sure you install that version.

—
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub<https://github.com/cython/cython/issues/5116#issuecomment-1304556313>, or unsubscribe<https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AGAFZKKPSS5EIIFC43YOZNDWGZUVXANCNFSM6AAAAAARX5XSFM>.
You are receiving this because you authored the thread.Message ID: ***@***.***>
You can specify the version you want with `pip install`. However please ask further support questions on the Cython-users mailing list rather than the bug tracker.

title: [BUG] Cannot find reference 'cimports' in 'cython.py | __init__.py | __init__.py'
